meanings.definition: Affected with or relating to scirrhus, a hard cancerous tumor.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the scirrhous lump on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: The scirrhous growth was causing the patient a lot of pain.
meanings.sent3: The scirrhous tumor decided to throw a party, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The scirrhous mass of problems in his life seemed impossible to overcome.
meanings.sent5: The scirrhous rock formation stood tall against the elements.

meanings.sent1: Her scirrhous attitude made it difficult for others to approach her.
meanings.sent2: The scirrhous appearance of the old building gave it a haunted look.
meanings.sent3: The scirrhous clouds in the sky seemed to be frowning down at us.
meanings.sent4: His scirrhous voice echoed through the empty halls, sending shivers down our spines.
meanings.sent5: The scirrhous texture of the fabric made it rough to the touch.
